theVacant:CrackedReflection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thevacant:Unnate. thevacant:Ricochet. NL At the end of your turn and whenever you gain a debuff, thevacant:Mine a size 1 copy of a random thevacant:Gem you have.

theVacant:ForgeSoul.NAME: Forge Soul
theVacant:ForgeSoul.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you thevacant:Mill a card, increase its damage and Block by !M! for the rest of combat.

theVacant:VoidForm.NAME: Void Form
theVacant:VoidForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [#ee82ee]Void[]. NL At the start of your turn, thevacant:Mill !M!.

theVacant:WaitInWrath.NAME: Wait in Wrath
theVacant:WaitInWrath.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are thevacant:Hollow, gain !M! Vigor. If you are thevacant:Healthy, gain !M! thevacant:Temperance.

theVacant:KeywordManager.NAME: KeywordManager
theVacant:KeywordManager.DESCRIPTION: Stores keywords that are added in other places for translations.

theVacant:WhenDarknessComes.NAME: When Darkness Comes
theVacant:WhenDarknessComes.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 thevacant:Doom to EVERYONE. NL Each thevacant:Doom increases damage taken on enemies by !M! more.
